comment._content: Amelia Edith Huddleston Barr (born March 29, 1831 in Ulverston, Lancashire, England; died March 10, 1919) was a British novelist. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amelia_Edith_Huddleston_Barr

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: She was British-born, but lived most of her eventful and prolific life in Texas and New York: www.tshaonline.org/handbook/online/articles/fba75
